nodes.text: An aqua-farm was an area of water devoted to the production of aquatic animals. Such farms were well-maintained on the swampy planet of Artiod Minor, where mated pairs of the native Artiodac species spent their centuries-long lifespans raising schools of prengalli.
Aqua-farms were mentioned in the 2016 reference book Star Wars: Aliens of the Galaxy, written by Jason Fry.
